bookInfo.author: J.K. Rowling
bookInfo.scheduledTime: 7:00 AM - 7:30 AM (Chapter 1), 12:00 PM - 12:30 PM (Chapter 2), 6:00 PM - 6:30 PM (Chapter 3)
bookInfo.description: Harry Potter, written by J.K. Rowling, is a popular fantasy series following the adventures of a young wizard named Harry Potter as he attends Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. The series explores themes of friendship, courage, and overcoming adversity.
higlights: Harry's discovery of his magical abilities and his acceptance into Hogwarts.
The introduction of memorable characters like Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger.
The gradual unfolding of the mystery surrounding the dark wizard Voldemort and his attempts to gain power.
